unlocked","params":{"_amount":"amount of network tokens","_provider":"provider of the network tokens"}},"ProtectionAdded(address,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"triggered when liquidity tokens","_reserveToken":"reserve token address"}},"ProtectionRemoved(address,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"triggered when liquidity protection is address"}},"ProtectionUpdated(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"triggered when liquidity protection is updated","params":{"_newPoolAmount":"new amount of pool tokens","_newReserveAmount":"new amount of reserve tokens","_prevPoolAmount":"previous amount of pool tokens","_prevReserveAmount":"previous amount of reserve tokens","_provider":"liquidity provider"}},"SystemBalanceUpdated(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated","params":{"_newAmount":"new amount","_prevAmount":"previous amount","_token":"token address"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"acceptOwnership()":{"details":"used by a new owner to accept an ownership transfer"},"addLockedBalance(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"adds new locked network token balance can only be called by the contract owner","params":{"_amount":"token index"}},"addProtectedLiquidity(address,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"adds protected liquidity can only be called by the contract owner","params":{"_poolAmount":"pool token amount","_poolToken":"pool token address","_provider":"liquidity provider","_reserveAmount":"reserve token amount","_reserveRateD":"rate of 1 protected reserve token in units of the other reserve token (denominator)","_reserveRateN":"rate of 1 protected reserve token in units of the other reserve token (numerator)","_reserveToken":"reserve token address","_timestamp":"timestamp"},"returns":{"_0":"new protected liquidity id"}},"decSystemBalance(address,uint256)":{"details":"decreases the system balance for a given token can only be called by the contract owner","params":{"_amount":"token amount","_token":"token address"}},"incSystemBalance(address,uint256)":{"details":"increases the system balance for a given token can only be called by the contract owner","params":{"_amount":"token amount","_token":"token address"}},"lockedBalance(address,uint256)":{"details":"returns an existing locked network token balance details","params":{"_index":"start index","_provider":"locked balances provider"},"returns":{"_0":"amount of network tokens","_1":"lock expiration time"}},"lockedBalanceCount(address)":{"details":"returns the number of network token locked balances for a given provider","params":{"_provider":"locked balances provider"},"returns":{"_0":"the number of network token locked balances"}},"lockedBalanceRange(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"returns a range of locked network token balances for a given provider","params":{"_endIndex":"end index (exclusive)","_provider":"locked balances provider","_startIndex":"start index"},"returns":{"_0":"locked amounts","_1":"expiration times"}},"protectedLiquidity(uint256)":{"details":"returns an existing protected liquidity details","params":{"_id":"protected liquidity id"},"returns":{"_0":"liquidity provider","_1":"pool token address","_2":"reserve token address","_3":"pool token amount","_4":"reserve token amount","_5":"rate of 1 protected reserve token in units of the other reserve token (numerator)","_6":"rate of 1 protected reserve token in units of the other reserve token (denominator)","_7":"timestamp"}},"protectedLiquidityCount(address)":{"details":"returns the number of protected liquidities for the given provider","params":{"_provider":"liquidity protected liquidity ids for the given provider","params":{"_provider":"liquidity provider"},"returns":{"_0":"protected liquidity ids"}},"removeLockedBalance(address,uint256)":{"details":"removes a id"}},"systemBalance(address)":{"details":"returns the system balance for a given token","params":{"_token":"token address"},"returns":{"_0":"system balance"}},"totalProtectedPoolAmount(address)":{"details":"returns the total protected pool token amount for a given pool","params":{"_poolToken":"pool token address"},"returns":{"_0":"total protected documentation.text:
@dev This contract serves as the storage of the liquidity protection mechanism.
 It holds the data and tokens, and it is generally non-upgradable.

devdoc.details: This contract serves as the storage of the liquidity protection mechanism. It holds the data and tokens, and it is generally non-upgradable.

BalanceLocked(address,uint256,uint256).details: triggered when network tokens are locked

BalanceUnlocked(address,uint256).details: triggered when network tokens are unlocked

ProtectionAdded(address,address,address,.details: triggered when liquidity protection is added

ProtectionRemoved(address,address,addres.details: triggered when liquidity protection is removed

ProtectionUpdated(address,uint256,uint25.details: triggered when liquidity protection is updated

SystemBalanceUpdated(address,uint256,uin.details: triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated

acceptOwnership().details: used by a new owner to accept an ownership transfer

addLockedBalance(address,uint256,uint256.details: adds new locked network token balance can only be called by the contract owner

addProtectedLiquidity(address,address,ad.details: adds protected liquidity can only be called by the contract owner

params._reserveRateD: rate of 1 protected reserve token in units of the other reserve token (denominator)
params._reserveRateN: rate of 1 protected reserve token in units of the other reserve token (numerator)

decSystemBalance(address,uint256).details: decreases the system balance for a given token can only be called by the contract owner

incSystemBalance(address,uint256).details: increases the system balance for a given token can only be called by the contract owner

lockedBalance(address,uint256).details: returns an existing locked network token balance details

lockedBalanceCount(address).details: returns the number of network token locked balances for a given provider

returns._0: the number of network token locked balances

lockedBalanceRange(address,uint256,uint2.details: returns a range of locked network token balances for a given provider

protectedLiquidity(uint256).details: returns an existing protected liquidity details

returns._5: rate of 1 protected reserve token in units of the other reserve token (numerator)
returns._6: rate of 1 protected reserve token in units of the other reserve token (denominator)

protectedLiquidityCount(address).details: returns the number of protected liquidities for the given provider

protectedLiquidityId(address,uint256).details: returns the id of a protected liquidity for the given provider at a specific index

protectedLiquidityIds(address).details: returns the list of protected liquidity ids for the given provider

removeLockedBalance(address,uint256).details: removes a locked network token balance can only be called by the contract owner

removeProtectedLiquidity(uint256).details: removes protected liquidity can only be called by the contract owner

systemBalance(address).details: returns the system balance for a given token

totalProtectedPoolAmount(address).details: returns the total protected pool token amount for a given pool

totalProtectedReserveAmount(address,addr.details: returns the total protected reserve amount for a given pool

transferOwnership(address).details: allows transferring the contract ownership the new owner still needs to accept the transfer can only be called by the contract owner

updateProtectedLiquidityAmounts(uint256,.details: updates an existing protected liquidity pool/reserve amounts can only be called by the contract owner

withdrawTokens(address,address,uint256).details: withdraws tokens held by the contract can only be called by the contract owner
